text: Strongly focuses on the digitalization of air transport and equips you with cross-disciplinary knowledge and abilities in aviation and ICT, offering a holistic understanding of ICT options and methods applied in aviation. OFFERS YOU: Language Master: English Duration: 2 years (4 semesters) ECTS: 120 Academic: University of Zagreb, University of Strasbourg, University of Zilina Professional: Menzies Aviation, Cluj Airport, Safety Investigation and Analysis Authority, Iasi Airport, Romanian Airport PARTNERS: Association, Croatia airlines International Aviation Organizations: Airports Council International, International Civic Aviation Organization Chief data officer, Air transport data architect, Big data architect, Cybersecurity engineer, Virtualization engineer, CARRIER OPPORTUNITIES: Airport UI&UX designer, Growth hacker, Mechatronic engineer.
